text:
can help.
They can:
• Keep you company and 
help to pass the time in the 
early stages.
• Hold your hand, wipe your 
face, give you sips of water, 
massage your back and 
shoulders.
• Help you move about or 
change position, or to get 
more comfortable.
• Encourage you as your 
labour progresses and your 
contractions get stronger.
• Remind you how to use 
relaxation and breathing 
techniques, perhaps 
breathing with you if it helps.
• Support your decisions 
about pain relief.
